item.title: LAMP Installation and Config
item.description: Install phpMyAdmin on Centos 8 Step 1: Install phpMyAdmin The phpMyAdmin tool is not included in the default CentOS 8 repositories. However, the file can be download manually. wget https://files.phpmyadmin.net/phpMyAdmin/4.9.4/phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip Extract the .zip file archive: unzip phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip Move the extracted files to the /usr/share/phpmyadmin directory: sudo mv phpMyAdmin-4.9.4-all-languages.zip /usr/share/phpmyadmin Change directories: cd /usr/share/phpmyadmin Rename the sample php configuration file: sudo mv config.

item.title: Hello World in Redis
item.description: This writing is actually a draft note made for myself, so that I myself donâ€™t forget what I had learned. But I think this note will be helpful for those who want to learn Redis. 1. Hello World in Redis 1.1. PING Returns PONG if no argument is provided, otherwise return a copy of the argument as a bulk. This command is often used to test if a connection is still alive, or to measure latency.

item.title: Redis Introduction and Installation
item.description: This writing is actually a draft note made for myself, so that I myself donâ€™t forget what I had learned. But I think this note will be helpful for those who want to learn Redis. 1. Introduction to Redis Redis is an acronym for Remote dictionary server. Itâ€™s an open source, in-memory and persistent key-value database / store which stores data as key-value pairs and also doubles up as a message broker.

item.title: PostgresSQL Notes
item.description: Table of Content Introduction to PostgreSQL ðŸš§ Installation Install PostgreSQL in Ubuntu Install PostgreSQL in CentOS Method 1: PostgreSQL Yum Repository Method 2: Using DNF Initial Configuration Creating a New PostgreSQL Database Cluster Understanding PostgreSQL Roles and Databases Creating a New Postgres Role Some Very First Commands Examples CREATE DATABASE DROP DATABASE CREATE TABLE Table Definition INSERT INTO SELECT DROP TABLE The Surface Sea Mockaroo Data Generator ORDER BY ASC DESC ORDER BY with Two-parameter DISTINCT WHERE BETWEEN LIKE GROUP BY GROUP BY with ORDER BY GROUP BY HAVING COALESCE Another Table Called car Basic Functions MAX MIN AVG ROUND COUNT SUM Basic Arithmetic Operations Discount Calculation ALIAS NULLIF DATE NOW Addition and Subtraction of Date INTERVAL EXTRACT AGE The Shallow Sea PRIMARY KEY CONSTRAINTS UNIQUE constraint CHECK Constraint DELETE UPDATE ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING DO UPDATE SET Foreign Keys, Joins and Relationships Delete Record with Foreign Keys JOIN INNER JOIN LEFT JOIN RIGHT JOIN FULL OUTER JOIN Exporting Query Results to CSV Serials and Sequences Extensions UUID Datatype UUID as Primary Key Introduction to PostgreSQL PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system with over 30 years of active development that has earned it a strong reputation for reliability, feature robustness, and performance.
